title: Internal attribution for fell asleep in class

content.question: Which of the following explanations most clearly demonstrates a dispositional attribution for the reason a student fell asleep in class?

choices.label: The student does not care about the class.
The warm temperature of the room put the student to sleep.
The studentâ€™s roommates are too noisy at night.

content.answer: The student does not care about the class.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
